lines.text: All we want to do is make you end up rich and respectable. You fight us every step of the way.
I don't want to be rich and respectable. I want to be just like the rest of you.
I'm going with you. I can draw pretty fast. We can be famous -- like the Dalton Brothers!
They're famous -- but they're just a little bit dead. They were hung!
Can you tell us who is the dirty stinkin' lowdown rat that shot our pa?
